data.actual_result: Right clicking on the text input box shows a checkbox to enable/disable spellchecking on Linux and Windows 7
data.expected_result: There should be no checkbox for enabling/disabling spellcheck on Linux or Windows 7 if they do not support spellcheck
data.short_description: There is a checkbox for spellcheck on Linux and Windows 7 even though Discord does not support spellcheck on either.
data.steps_to_repro: - Update Discord Canary to build 10549 or later - Right click on the text input box - See a checkbox to enable/disable spellchecking even though it is not supported on Linux or Windows 7 in Discord
